title: Inside Trump's Head
description:
Jacob Weisberg talks to the singer-songwriter, Aimee Mann, about her new song "Can't You Tell" where she enters the mind of Donald Trump.
Trumpcast is brought to you by Texture. Get access to your favorite magazines all in one place. Learn more about Texture and start your free trial today by going to Texture.com/trumpcast.

And by Boll and Branch. For luxury bedding at a low price, go to BollandBranch.com and use promo code trumpcast to get 50 dollars off your first set of sheets.
